name: Brilliant...
description:
I can only recommend that you read the how to play first! The game starts pretty quickly and you can fail easily if you don't start right away...

Brilliant... is a small, challenging management game where you control a bunch of survivors who must do whatever they can in order to stay alive before being rescued! Get a set of three random plane crash survivors and see what you can do!

I am aware of a fair  few current bugs, but wanted to get the game uploaded in time for the game jam! If the game seems relatively well received, I'll happily do that extra bit of work in order to fix some of the bugs in the game!

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam Week 89 - The jam had the theme of 'Small Island'!

Music created by Benjamin Hopkins/City of Animals (@cityofanimalsmusic  /www.thecityofanimals.com /https://cityofanimals.itch.io/)
